From: Marian Craig [mailto:marian_craig@hotmail.com] Sent: Tuesday, September 20, 2011 5:38 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: RE: MBO Partners
Hi Steve!
I figured that I would just sit tight with SunGard for now. I will be sure and let you know if that changes.
Many thanks,
Marian From: sarhancet@mbopartners.com To: marian_craig@hotmail.com Date: Tue, 20 Sep 2011 16:32:06 -0400 Subject: MBO Partners Marian,
When would be a good time for us to discuss MBO Partners so I can answer any questions you have on our program?
Regards, Steve
___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Enrollments and Market Development MBO Partners
